title: Unveiling dye adsorption capability of Moringa oleifera functionalized hybrid porous MOF-GO composites: In vitro and in silico ecotoxicity assessment via antibacterial and molecular docking studies

The present study demonstrated the synthesis of sustainable and eco-friendly composites comprised of Fe & Al metal-organic frameworks (Fe-MOF and Al-MOF) and their graphene oxide composites (AlGC and FeGC). Post-synthetic...
